entry.question: What battle cards are in the Devestator Pack?
entry.answer: 3 x Primary Laser 2 x Improvised Shield 3 x Force Field 3 x Scrapper Gauntlets 3 x Grenade Launcher 3 x Blast Shield 3 x Builder's Tools 3 x Rapid Conversion 2 x Ramming Speed 3 x Pep Talk 3 x Reclaim 3 x Work Overtime 3 x Heavy Landing 3 x Constructicon Engima
